item.title: Choose for Me
item.description: A Puzzle Drama game that will take you on a journey in the Mads Ever mind, between visual suggestions and emotional moments. Project trailer made by uut Games indie game studio. This game is still in development, but can be already added to the Steam wishlist here . I was involved in this project as 3D Artist, Material Designer, Audio & Video Editor and Cut Scenes Director. Technologies involved: Unreal Engine: Render Engine, Cut-scene editing and animating Bender: Modeling and uv atlasing Here’s the project trailer:

item.title: Revenge of the Flies
item.description: A SciFi short film in which a swarm of flies goes to a programmer house in search of revenge. This short film is made for the special effects course during my M.Sc. in Cinema and media engineering. I was involed in this project as VFX Artist and Particle animator. Technologies involved: Maya: Particles animation Bender: Flies modeling and animation AfterEffects: Compositing and camera matchmoving DaVinci Resolve: Editing and Color Grading Here’s the short: Crew:
